contents.text: Welcome to Symantec South Bay, the world’s leading cyber security company dedicated to protecting your data across endpoints, cloud, and infrastructure.
For sales, pricing, and account management, press 1.
For new product demos and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a walkthrough of your newest endpoint protection product and obtain a quote.
I need a demo and pricing for endpoint protection to secure my small veteran-run office.
Schedule a demo of your new endpoint detection solution and get detailed pricing information.
I’d like to see a demo and pricing for your antivirus software for my home computer.
Schedule a demo of your endpoint protection suite and ask about student lab pricing options

contents.text: For existing account or billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an account representative.

navigationGoals: Review my current Symantec subscription invoice and update my billing method.
I was double-billed on my subscription and need to fix my billing and update my payment method.
Discuss my upcoming license renewal and clarify charges on my current billing statement.
I need help understanding my recent renewal charge on my security subscription.
Review and update our university’s existing campus license billing statement

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to the endpoint support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a malfunctioning antivirus agent on my workstation immediately.
My laptop’s security software isn’t updating virus definitions; I need help getting it working.
Troubleshoot a policy enforcement error on my endpoint security agent not reporting to the console.
I’m having trouble updating the antivirus on my laptop and need support.
Troubleshoot why the Norton endpoint agent keeps crashing on my research workstation

contents.text: For cloud and infrastructure security assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to the cloud infrastructure support team.

navigationGoals: Configure your cloud workload protection for our AWS environment.
My cloud backups keep failing encryption; I need assistance securing and restoring my files.
Resolve a misconfiguration in my cloud workload firewall that's blocking legitimate traffic.
I can’t access my backed-up files in the cloud and need help restoring them.
Configure Symantec’s cloud security tools for my AWS‐based physics simulation environment
